name: I Dreamt Of Fish
description:
The fish spoke to me. It was obviously a dream, but felt so real.

The fish pleaded for help. I reached into my pockets and found sustenance.

The fish asked me to guide them. I escorted them to exit of the dream.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Open inventory

Left Click - Throw food

WORK IN PROGRESS

Please bear in mind, this game is not remotely finished. The general mechanics are in place enough to be able to interact with the game as intended, but there is currently not much in the way of gameplay.
